setText(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Sets the contents of the clipboard to the specified text.
setText(java.lang.CharSequence).history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 11

hasText().Description: Returns true if the clipboard contains text; false otherwise.
hasText().history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 11

getText().Description: Returns the text on the clipboard. It will eventually be possible to store types other than text too, in which case this will return null if the type cannot be coerced to text.
getText().history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 11

ClassDesc: Old text-only interface to the clipboard. See @B_android#content#ClipboardManager_E@ for the modern API.
